data.title: Masterclass Eric Rochant ENG
data.meta_description: Eric Rochant is a French filmmaker and Tv showrunner who has written, directed and produced several movies and television shows. Eric Rochant was in Fontainebleau to talk about the creation and writing of his series, The Bureau, for CANAL+. An exciting model combining American experience and French know-how.     Masterclass chaired by Tone C. RÃ¸nning (commissioning editor, NRK).
